elements.name: Verify that a POST request to `/api/visitorsPurposeId` with valid authorization and correct data returns a
elements.description:
200 status code, a "Success" message, and validates the response body contents (`id`, `visitors_purpose`, `description`,
  `created_at`).

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeId" path parameters.
The api user prepares a POST request to send to the api visitorsPurposeid endpoint containing the information 1259.
The api user sends a POST request and saves the returned response.

steps.name: The api user verifies that the status code is 200.
The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success".
The api user verifies that the data in the response body includes "1259", "purpose update", "came for student visit" and "2025-01-06 18:12:16".

name: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to access the Visitor Purpose information of the user whose id is
